title: Four people shot at gas station, suspect on the loose
content:
MEMPHIS, TN (WMC) -
Four people were shot after an altercation at a gas station.
Police said the four encountered a man in a black Mustang around 7:15 p.m. at a gas station at Mount Moriah Road and Ridgeway Road.
The four were taken to the hospital in non-critical condition.
The suspect is still on the loose.
